trips_df.name: trip_id
trips_df.description: unique trip identifier. Will be added automatically if not provided

trips_df.name: person_id
trips_df.description: person identifier

trips_df.name: all_modes
trips_df.description: list of all modes used on a specific trip

trips_df.name: main_mode
trips_df.description: name of the main mode used on a specific trip

trips_df.name: from_act_type
trips_df.description: name of activity prior to trip

trips_df.name: to_act_type
trips_df.description: name of activity after trip

trips_df.name: start_time
trips_df.description: time of trip start in seconds from 0:00

trips_df.name: end_time
trips_df.description: time of trip end in seconds from 0:00

trips_df.name: beeline_distance
trips_df.description: beeline distance between start and end point in meters

trips_df.name: routed_distance
trips_df.description: real distance (on a network) in meters

trips_df.name: travel_time
trips_df.description: travel time in seconds

trips_df.name: waiting_time
trips_df.description: waiting time in seconds

trips_df.name: access_time
trips_df.description: time spent accessing the first vehicle in seconds

trips_df.name: access_distance
trips_df.description: distance travelled accessing the first vehicle in meters

trips_df.name: access_waiting_time
trips_df.description: waiting time during egress in seconds

trips_df.name: egress_time
trips_df.description: time spent egressing from the first vehicle in seconds

trips_df.name: egress_distance
trips_df.description: distance travelled egressing from the first vehicle in meters

trips_df.name: from_x
trips_df.description: x coordinate of the trip starting point. Coordinate reference system: EPSG:25833

trips_df.name: from_y
trips_df.description: y coordinate of the trip starting point. Coordinate reference system: EPSG:25833

trips_df.name: to_x
trips_df.description: x coordinate of the trip end point. Coordinate reference system: EPSG:25833

trips_df.name: to_y
trips_df.description: y coordinate of the trip end point. Coordinate reference system: EPSG:25833

trips_df.name: legs_count
trips_df.description: number of legs

legs_df.name: leg_id
legs_df.description: unique leg identifier. Will be added automatically if not provided

legs_df.name: mode
legs_df.description: name of the pt line used

legs_df.name: from_act_type
legs_df.description: name of activity prior to leg

legs_df.name: start_time
legs_df.description: time of trip start in seconds from 0:00

legs_df.name: end_time
legs_df.description: time of trip end in seconds from 0:00

legs_df.name: beeline_distance
legs_df.description: beeline distance between start and end point in meters

legs_df.name: routed_distance
legs_df.description: real distance (on a network) in meters

legs_df.name: from_x
legs_df.description: x coordinate of the leg starting point. Coordinate reference system: EPSG:25833

legs_df.name: from_y
legs_df.description: y coordinate of the leg starting point. Coordinate reference system: EPSG:25833

legs_df.name: to_x
legs_df.description: x coordinate of the leg end point. Coordinate reference system: EPSG:25833

legs_df.name: to_y
legs_df.description: y coordinate of the leg end point. Coordinate reference system: EPSG:25833
